subject: Order SSN4363
description_text:
Hello,

It has been already 18 days since i made my order and it has still not even
shipped. What is going on? Please advise shortly.

Thank you

Best,
Arvid Tampuu
Fookus Pookus Grip

conversations.body_text: 你好，Arvid Tampuu，  您的订单原计划从我们的德国仓库发货，但由于运输延误，货物到达时间晚于预期。目前货物已抵达仓库，我们正在进行入库处理并安排DHL快递发货。我们将于明日提供运单号。
